titles.title: Improving Clinical Care Workforce for Our Vets Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to modify authorities relating to the collective bargaining of employees in the Veterans Health Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 5/6/2014--Introduced. Improving Clinical Care Workforce for Our Vets Act - Repeals provisions excluding any matter or question concerning professional conduct or competence, peer review, or the establishment, determination, or adjustment of employee compensation from the applicability of collective bargaining rights for Veterans Health Administration employees.
